name: NSPoint
desc: A point in a Cartesian coordinate system.

items.name: NSEqualPoints
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two points are equal.

items.name: NSMakePoint
items.desc: Creates a new NSPoint from the specified values.

items.name: NSPointFromString
items.desc: Returns a point from a text-based representation.

items.name: NSStringFromPoint
items.desc: Returns a string representation of a point.

items.name: NSPointFromCGPoint
items.desc: Returns an NSPoint typecast from a CGPoint.

items.name: NSPointToCGPoint
items.desc: Returns a CGPoint typecast from an NSPoint.

items.name: NSZeroPoint
items.desc: An NSPoint structure with both x and y coordinates set to 0.
